name: Ecotect Weather File
summary: Learn about .WEA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: WEA files contain weather pattern information and are used for simulation purposes. They are saved in a binary format that can only be opened with Autodesk software.
NOTE: Autodesk acquired the Ecotect program from Square One Research in 2008. But in 2015, Ecotect Analysis was no longer available for purchase.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
